name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Fabulous campground. The electric cabins (200 series) are organized, supplied with necessary resources, and are super comfortable. My friends and I had a really splendid time there on an early December weekend. Also, the park staff are ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great little park with excellent hiking trails.  Most sites are spacious, decently private, with park sections for everyone - electrical for trailers, walk-in sites for folks that want a more private experience, well maintained roads and ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review:
This place is beautiful with many beaches and coasts to play on. I definitely recommend you to get a kayak or canoe to explore the shores. We found a nice big rock a little cove and had a blast. 

Went here for the long weekend and I ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: We had a lovely weekend enjoying the trails. Walking poles of some sort really helped. As it's winter in Ontario, the topsy turvy weather meant mud one day, then ice, then snow on top. At night, stars lit the sky and we could hear deep ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: What an amazing afternoon hiking Bonnie‚Äôs Pond Trail!  There was literally no one on this trail!  We‚Äôre talking October!! Colours were spectacular & pups loved running to their hearts content!  An abundance of flora & fauna to ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: We stayed at the cabin 209 and its condition was superb.  Washroom and shower facilities were clean and good design in term of function and locking arrangements.  The stand up kitchen style sinks made clean of discs and other stuffs so ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: My family and I have been camping at silent lake for years and we always have a wonderful time! It‚Äôs our go-to location for camping most summers. Good quality camp sites, lots to see and do, helpful staff, and clean environment!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great place to go for a canoe trip and a nice long hike around the lake. Would definitely recommend. Not very busy and super clean and well marked trails

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Took one star off for the bugs. Lovely trail with some great lookouts. Park was clean and had a terrific beach. Mosquitoes are insane on the trail. Dope up!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: This was my first time hiking and we did the Bonnie's trail which was amazing! For beginners it's a moderate difficulty trail. We saw some bear claws or I thought that's what it was :) the park staff could have been nicer, when I walked ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Nice park, very quiet even with a full campground. Bathrooms relatively clean. Lake was very calm with beautiful scenery, lots of places to pull your canoe off to the side for a nice relaxing lunch. Staff very helpful and friendly.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Conditions were beautiful! Trails well groomed.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review:
Hi 
I hardly recommend this place. All things are perfect

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: I've been going to Silent Lake since I was a kid. Beautiful Provincial park with no motorboats. Great fishing, swimming and camping.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Really nice, clean camp ground.  We stayed in cabin 208 which is well located and quiet.  Comes with a friendly raccoon üòÜ.  Shallow sand beach, nice co.fort station with shower and dish washing rooms.  Good canoeing and fishing.  In general a wonderful, fun family experience.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: This has been a great park every time I've visited. Especially since they remodeled parts of it. The campsites are clean and have distance between them. The comfort stations have always been clean and I've never seen them run out of ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Even though it was long weekend and day use area parking was full, once we launched our kayaks it was all quiet. A beautiful lake for kayaking/canoeing. Very helpful staff. We don't have opinion of a camping as we didn't stay overnight.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Nice little park, very family oriented. Lots of wildlife. Saw deer, wild turkey, water snake, Heron. Very cheeky chipmunks and squirrels, and raccoons so like any park keep your food and garbage  locked up. Canoe rentals, nice sand beach ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: What can I say? This place is great. The staff was ALWAYS friendly and polite. I felt completely welcomed. You could ask anything you wanted and they wouldn't treat you any less. The place has great comfort stations for being a outdoors ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: This is my family's favorite camping location. We go here every year. if you are looking for a quiet getaway from Toronto, this is the perfect location  just 2 hours from the city. It has a beautiful lake which is not adulterated by ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great place for hiking, biking, kayaking and camping. Good for just a day trip or an over night trip. There is a area with a beach and I believe they rent kayaks and canoes. The views are breathtaking if your in the area it's a must see.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great park. Well-maintained. Clean comfort stations. Nice beaches. Beautiful and peaceful lakes for swimming, canoeing, and kayaking. Camp sites are great with utmost privacy. Park office is new; great and helpful staff. A must to visit park.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Some awesome walk in sites near the campground beach. Nice quiet lake for paddling. Day use beach is nice too. Some good hiking or biking. A lot of the sites lack level tent pads, but most are decently spaced. I liked it here. Bugs can be bad early in the season due to some swampy areas, so be prepared!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Amazing experience as always! Beautiful campsites, lots of space between sites (partly because the surrounding area is full of hills and whatnot), but also good tree cover to keep privacy. Many options for campsites and generally a very ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great park. Had a great time here. It was my first time camping here and I'd highly recommend it to anyone interested.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: This park is great. Great view, clean and staffs are very friendly. My only complain would be the water tap where I stayed. It had a muddy water  for as long as I stayed. I ran it for several minutes and tried many times. Muddy all the ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Amazingly clean and fresh facilities. The staff were extraordinarily friendly as well. I have been to many provincial parks in Ontario, Quebec, Nova Scotia, New Brunswick and PEI, and this one really surprised me with how nice the facilities were. The beach is small and beautiful to swim at as well!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great camping for fishing, kayaking and relaxing. Ton's of wild animals and bugs :)  The reason i'm giving this place 3 stars is due to the unclean toilets and comfort stations. One of the comfort stations was closed which created big lineups.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: This is a great park that is a task of Algonquin on a smaller scale.  The gate house is new with two dumping and three filling stations in the park.  There are three docs to launch boats from and a well organized rental system.  The park ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Silent Lake PP's Lake Trail is a great hike!  Last time I did this hike was ~30 years ago.  Two days ago we made a 4 hour stop and did this hike with our two dogs.  The park was largely empty, and we saw no one on the trail.  14.6km on the gps.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great place for a quiet getaway. We stayed here for two nights in a cabin. When we arrived, my first impression was of how clean it was. The cabin was very accessible with stairs on one side and a ramp on the other. We love the closed in ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful park that is open all year.  The Lakeshore trail is is a great hike for intermediate hikers, make sure to have snacks and water if you are doing the loop.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great park I have been here several times but they are starting to let it run down. Maintenance of the faculties very poor the ladies washroom only had 2 sinks out of 4 working when we complained they didn't seem too interested ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful park. Great, quiet lakes for swimming. More trails of varying length would be useful here.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Ontario parks cabins are nice clean comfortable. Lake has clean water. Canoe rental is good. Walking trails are nice but be prepared for lots of mosquito.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great swimming area next to the beach, nice trails, very beautiful lake but the sites we had were awful. Not much privacy and filled with hills and massive rocks. We chose the most recent site because it looked private, after arriving we ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great place for camping, picnics, swimming or canoeing. Very clean washrooms at least at the entrance. Will camper here next year.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: We really enjoy camping at silent lake. Had not been here for about 5 years with the kids and really miss the raft in the swimming area. Otherwise this is an awesome place to kids for a geat camping experience.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful, well-maintained park grounds. Very quiet, very serene. The facilities have all been recently renovated and updated, which is a plus. We stayed in one of the newly built cabins and wow! Talk about luxury. Our only complaint was ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great hiking trails, park itself was really nice, staff were kind. It's relatively quiet, however there was a screaming crying baby the whole time my partner and I were there. .. which made it a not so silent lake.. otherwise it was good. Would go back in the fall when theres less chance if smaller crying children.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Small park. Beach though small is close to the entrance. Reasonably priced canoe rentals available. Lake water is calm, so easy to canoe.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Yurt rental great beach fabulous semi rough camping BBQ was absolutely filthy so I cleaned it. Ran over pothole on paved road bearly flattened my sedans rear right so had to drive 30 km to get air right away. My point very overstaffed park very lazy staff.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Security is a little strict but otherwise nice camp grounds and nature all around.  Can rent canoes and water gear without a hassle.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Lovely spacious park.  Quiet as no engines allowed.  Two good beaches and camp sites are quite spacious and not too close together.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Good spacing of camp sites. Electrical sites and yurts available. I really like this park.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review:
The walk in sites are great. Beach is clean.
What's up with the price of wood? Dudes: you have a monopoly on the market! What gives?

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Amazing park, would give it more than 5 stars if possible. I stayed in a cabin for four days and it had so many amenities. There was a binder that had information about the park trails, renting canoes etc. The cabin offered a kettle, ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: A typical Ontario provincial park; excellent. This park has extra large sites making for a more private feel. We stayed 2 days in a yurt and really enjoyed not having to pack and set up a tent. The beds were comfortable and a bbq was ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Stayed in a cabin, small fridge and microwave. Very clean and close to amenities. Fantastic couple of days.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: It was amazing experience the hiking was amazing and the lake was really nice. The lake is very silent as the name suggests and its a great place to unwind

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great park with clean facilities. I would have given 5 if there weren't too much mosquitoes. But had fun

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: While the park itself is beautiful, the hiking map and trails need to be updated. The maps provided lacked detailed information, there were only a few trail markers as my husband and I hiked along. Having hiked at many provincial parks ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review:
Yes it's worth the trip 
So beautiful and so fun

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great place to camp and fun kayaking. The place is very clean and the staff are great

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great for winter camping, especially in the new cabins. Cabins comfortably house a family of 4 and are great place for a midwinter break. Heated washrooms and dishwashing facilities at the comfort station are great and there is a good ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: The camping park is very family friendly, there are little beaches, canoe rental, short maintained walks, nice toilets and laundry. But not too much on the lines of serious hiking, and not as great views as Algonquin or Bruce.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Pristine water for swimming.  No motorized boats. No pollution.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Fantastic camp sites, newly upgraded comfort stations; you could go swimming in the warm lake or hike on the trail. Canoe rental is available near the beach. There is coffee available for purchase at the park office. The only thing is ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Loved the beach! Will come back and bring more family.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Staff do a great job of keeping bathrooms and the park clean. No motorboats or cottages on the lake was wonderful. Access for everyone Cabins and Yurts available just bring bedding and food.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Camped here twice and once in a yurt. It is avery nice provincial park. Lots of activities to do!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Scenic and peaceful place. Very calm waters... great for canoeing.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Nice and quiet. Cool lake with some islands and swimming remote spots.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Tent camping, yurt camping, just hiking, all so so fun.  I went yurt camping in February when the lake was frozen solid and was able to walk out on the ice during the night and gaze up at the stars.  It was such a good trip! Also yurt camping gives unlimited wood supply!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Love this place come every year it's always a blast

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Fantastic park. Very helpful staff. Very clean washrooms. Roomy campsites.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Drunk driver who drove around in the park on a sat night. They were loud and made the visit terrible

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Clean lake, active rangers doing activities with children, and a nice little beach. Definitely a nice little spot to relax.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great for canoeing and for families! The cabins are awesome... Well worth the cost!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: An amazing place to Camp. The yurt and comfort stations were clean. The Park Rangers were very friendly and helpful.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: great camping, swimming, hiking, mountain biking.  non motor boat lake. great for nature enthusiasts. various accommodations including  yurts, cabins, electric and non electric sites, walk-in and drive in sites. hot showers available.  camp store is limited. the town of Apsley is 20 +mins away for supplies.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Not overbooked like so many parks. A beautiful lake with no motorised boats allowed. Fantastic night sky views. Caution: The racoons are bold!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Nice park. Enjoyed the 15km hike. Bugs are bad this year so you have to keep moving. Nice distance between sites.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: I loved canoeing on the lake. The campgrounds facilities are well maintained, but it had a lot of mosquitoes on that particular weekend.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Another great provincial park to visit with hiking trails and mountain biking trails and a big lake for canoeing. Nice new facilities too.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Amazing park. Even the walk ins are awesome !

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Greatest camping spots! Great campsites, very private and lots of room

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Nice place for Canoeing and Kayaking. Not much crowded.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Smaller park, quiet, good sites, lots of trails for hiking and cycling, canoe and kayak rentals to go out on the gorgeous lake.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great experience at Silent Lake. No mosquitoes when we visited the last week of August.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful spot to canoe. Small lake so you can easily see the whole thing in one go. Even though we got skunked we had a great time

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Good park. Small beach for campers. Prefer other parks.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful quiet place to stop. We stayed for 2 nights in the log cabins. Well equipped with microwave and fridge.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: We visited on a winter weekend and had an amazing time. Unfortunately mother nature didn't cooperate and we were unable to ski, but we had a great time hiking. Silent lake is a beautiful park and I can't wait to return (hopefully to camp).

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: The new cabins are a great way to get out to the parks in the winter. Clean and quiet, and close to the excellent new comfort stations. Probably much less private in the summer, since they are right beside the day use area.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great facilities, canoe rentals and beautiful views. Family friendly and memorable moments for kids and all.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: A remote feeling. Beautiful, clean swimming lake.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: One of the best parks in Ontario! A secret jem. We have been going here for 26 years!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful, serene and clean! Park Warden Jennifer, and the rest of the staff, were incredibly kind and helpful, even calling me a week in advance to make sure things were discussed prior to our arrival. Stayed in a yurt in early December and it was very l comfortable and clean. Definitely will be returning soon!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful provincial park. Beautiful lake great for kayaking

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Perhaps one of the best provincial parks Ontario has to offer

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: A good family camping experince. Staff are friendly and the park is quite furnished with comforts such as showers, beaches and bathrooms

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful cabins and lovely canoeing lake.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Nice place to walk

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great place for camping and canoeing. Great place for the family.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: The staff are so friendly and it's a beautiful park to explore in the winter. We stayed in the winterized cabins and they were so fabulous. -20¬∞ outside and you were toasty warm inside. Highly recommended as a winter camping trip!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: This place was beautiful! But if you have a walk in site.. I suggest you bring a wagon to haul your equipment.. we were camped in lot 74 and I was sooooo thankful for my wagon. There's quite a few hills and twists and turns. But all in all. A great stay!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great water and very scenic. Perfect for families

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: This park is my never never land quiet and peaceful

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Fantastic place for kids, families and people looking for a quite, clean and well situated place to get away to

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful lake. Gorgeous views.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great park. Everything is perfect. The yurts location is good and they're well maintained. The trails were amazing, a real winter wonderland.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: A quiet lake. Beautiful campgrounds. Trail that goes around the whole lake

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: love this park... it is in an extremely hilly area tho, so it's not for the faint if heart. serious enthusiasts are best for this park in regard to the trails

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: I have been coming to this Park since 1980. Seen many changes both good and bad, some even made me sad. Having said that it is still my favourite Ontario Park!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Quiet and secluded... A great place to relax and forget about the busy life

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Everything was absolutely perfect. Very clean facilities

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: It has a very nice scenery. Love to be back!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: So peaceful and beautiful. Good quality facilities and the walk in campsites are a pleasant change

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful place to visit with family and friends.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Nice little park

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Only critic would have to be the campsites should be less visible to each other. Comfort stations, electrical outlets, and surrounding area are very nice additions to the park.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful, peaceful, clean, and perfect for a weekend getaway!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review:
You can rent a canoe for 6 hours for 25$.
 and you can rent a camping spot deep into jungle for 45 $ per night... the amenities are very clean and the lake is truly quite and peaceful...perfect weekend getaway only 2 hours away from Toronto.... a lot of rental cottages around the area... recommended

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Love this place. Come here year after year.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful, quite park with a lovely beach.  Unfortunately there were lots of horse flies, which was very annoying.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Nice park, restroom clean, can fishing, kayak and hiking.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Had an amazing camping experience

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great place!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great for tent camping. The roads in the campground are very hilly and steep which can make driving with a trailer difficult. Sites have a lot of trees and entrances are narrow. Great for tents but hard to back up a trailer. The hiking trails are very nice. Next time I'll be heading back to reserve a hike in site.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: A tiny, quiet delight.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Fabulous camping and hiking.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Loved it here! Stunning views!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Lovely camp sites - stayed in a serviced site in the Granite Ridge Campground on June 13/17. Interesting hiking trails. Clean and modern comfort stations. Still have some pit toilets to service remote parts of the campground. Friendly staff and newly renovated entrance to park.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Awesome place to camp and explore. Really good hiking trails (bring bug spray) and super shallow warm water. Lovely canoeing around the motor free lake. Stayed in Granite Ridge in 112. Amazing site... super good drainage in wet storm. ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: A small number of really good trails

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great staff!! Even better park!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Insects were nasty this year, so bring a mosquito net for your eating area. Otherwise, it was very good.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Silent Lake Provincial Park is a beautiful campground. The staff of teenagers will not provide adequate directions. Please speak with one of the ground keepers. They will have a much better understanding of the park than the ones in the ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: A great park with equally good amenities. Perfect for winter glamping, with a good amount of activities.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review:
Place is beautiful.
Too many bugs and unfortunately some of the washrooms were not working.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Silent Lake has great electric and non-electric sites. Facilities are cleaned regularly and serviceable. There are two beaches to enjoy and canoe rentals are available. No motorized boats are allowed in the lake making for a tranquil ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: The name gives this lake justice. It was so quiet. We had a hike in camp site and it was an easy walk to the parking lot and toilet. Beautiful Lake and surrounding forest!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Great lake natural but a lot moskito...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Cabins are as beautiful as the view, only got to stay for a day in the winter but it was amazing, highly recommended.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Stunning.  Amazing natural setting, especially the walk-in campsites.  Simple, safe alternative to canoe camping.  Worth the drive if you are short on time but want to immerse yourself in nature and be surrounded by wildlife.  I had a ...

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Lovely park with good facilities. The hiking trail along the lakeshore is fun. Didn't try the mountain bike trail, but just pedaling around was exhausting because this park is so hilly. Nice camper's beach but a pain to have to go all the way back to the front gate to rent and return canoes.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review:
Amazing staff, park is well taken care of.
Cabins are great, warm  and welcoming.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: We've been here over a dozen times. Always great, peaceful, clean, and quiet. Everyone comes for the same reason and nearly everyone is respectful of others.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: This park looks newly renovated and has lots of comfort stations. The place is on an amazing piece of property and has a great lake for kayaking or canoeing. Only negative thing I could say is that my friend had to rent a kayak and they don't allow you to reserve

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Very nice kayaking trip today

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: No Fireplaces and huge Mosquitoes.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Roads and facilities are all in great condition.  Perfect escape to isolated wilderness only 2 hours from Toronto.  Mountain biking, hiking and canoeing mecca!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Everything was awesome but there were alot of black flies & they bite!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Fishing could have been a little bit better or maybe I was using the wrong lure

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review:
Long weekend in a yurt with a wood fire stove! This was our first time in a yurt. It was amazing! Wood and propane provided by the park. Propane for the bbq.
Close to snow shoe trail bonnies pond.
Heated shower rooms and dish washing station a short drive from our yurt. 

Highly recommend this experience!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Relatively big park but very quiet. Large trees and good chance to see some wildlife. Nice beach and decent trails

review: Interesting experience. We have got the off road site. 5 minutes walk from parking. Lots of hills and roots sticking from the ground. Privacy is average , some sites are on a high ground and have clear view on neighbor sites. If you are after privacy I would not recommend. Perfect for canoying and fishing.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Beautiful experience

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park

review: This is a beautiful provincial campground.  I really enjoyed our visit to this campground.  It accommodates all campers from RV, trailers and tents.

review: Amazing hike. What a beautiful place. Glad we made it to the look out at the top. Very scenic!

review: Spent only one night there, camp sites are ok, kind of small compared to other campgrounds I've been and not very leveled. The lake is beautiful and you can even fish although the fishes we caught were tiny.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Quiet, calm, and clean.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Love this place! Great trail around the lake!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Plowed main routes, heated washroom, awesome snowshoeing trail. Winter wonderland.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Absolutely beautiful!!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Hidden gem just north of Peterborough. amazing 15 km hike trail around the lake. Absolutely no crowded. Loon can be heard miles away. Some campsites can be challenge as only walk accessible but you will get rewarded.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: Can do winter camping in yurts, electric yurts, cabins or tents . You can cross country ski or snow shoe or toboggan or skate or hike.

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: We visited Silent Lake on a winter camping trip with Cruising Canoes. The snowshoeing was ideal, and the park also offers yurts for those looking for an indoor/outdoor experience in the winter. Can't wait to visit in the summertime!

name: Silent Lake Provincial Park
review: my favourite provincial park by far - great site options - yurts, walk-ins, drive-ins, and cabins coming soon. several beaches to choose from and lots of places to picnic if you take the canoes or paddle boards out. The hiking trail is challenging - tough to do when it's wet.
